Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
Statistics
public class Statistics extends Object
Class for calculating and displaying various statistics related to internships and applications. Provides detailed statistics for students (including eligible internships and active applications) and company representatives, using repository pattern for data access.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayCompanyRepresentativeStatistics(CompanyRepresentative rep)
    Displays comprehensive statistics for a company representative, including internship summary, application breakdown, and performance metrics.
    void
    displayStudentStatistics(Student student)
    Displays comprehensive statistics for a student, including application history, success rate (including withdrawn applications that were previously successful), eligible internships, and active application count.
